cause.description:
Please help Andy and Tessa make a difference by sponsoring us in the 2007 Best Buddies Hearst Castle Challenge.
https://www.kintera.org/faf/donorReg/donorPledge.asp?ievent=202286&supId=115892501%0A
1. Support Best Buddies
2. Inspire those with intellectual disabilities
3. Help those with intellectual disabilities get jobs
cause.mission: Serve those with intellectual learning disabilities
cause.name: Best Buddies
